===Etymology===
From {{zh-l|*波羅蜜|[[paramita]]; [[perfection]]}}, with the addition of the {{zh-l|*艹|grass}} radical to indicate a plant.

The association between ''[[paramita]]'' and ''[[jackfruit]]'' may have resulted from the confusion of the two Sanskrit loanwords {{ltc-l|波羅蜜|[[paramita]]}} and {{ltc-l|波那娑|[[jackfruit]]|id=1,1,1}}.
